library.title: The Da Vinci Code
library.author: Dan Brown
library.quote: 'Life is filled with secrets. You can't learn them all at once.'

library.title: The Great Gatsby
library.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
library.quote: 'He looked at her the way all women want to be looked at by a man.'

library.title: Eat, Pray, Love
library.author: Elizabeth Gilbert
library.quote: 'People think a soul mate is your perfect fit, and that's what everyone wants. But a true soul mate is a mirror, the person who shows you everything that is holding you back, the person who brings you to your own attention so you can change your life.'

library.title: The Alchemist
library.author: Paulo Coelho
library.quote: 'It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.'

library.title: The Road
library.author: Cormac McCarthy
library.quote: 'You forget what you want to remember, and you remember what you want to forget.'

library.title: The Picture Of Dorian Gray
library.author: Oscar Wilde
library.quote: 'Nowadays people know the price of everything and the value of nothing.'

library.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
library.author: Harper Lee
library.quote: 'You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view... Until you climb inside of his skin and walk around in it.'

library.title: The Little Prince
library.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry
library.quote: 'The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart.'

library.title: Anna Karenina
library.author: Leo Tolstoy
library.quote: 'It's much better to do good in a way that no one knows anything about it.'

library.title: The Monk Who Sold His Ferrari
library.author: Robin Sharma
library.quote: 'Your 'I CAN' is more important than your IQ.'
